code: import axios from"axios";export default{getBook:function getBook(title){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=".concat(title,"&key=AIzaSyDrahnrWwfTZcCcOo8EBVfxgt_zJZpJHqI"));},saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);},getSavedBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);}};
